paragraphs.text: It’s one thing to take a nepotistic approach to a private business, as Trump has done with his company. It’s another, however, to take that approach in government.
paragraphs.name: 97f6
202e
paragraphs.text: “Nepotism is kind of a factor of life,” Eric said. “We might be here because of nepotism, but we’re not still here because of nepotism. You know, if we didn’t do a good job, if we weren’t competent, believe me, we wouldn’t be in this spot.”
